Home.title: with high accuracy in real time.
Home.desp: AI Netra has been created for object detection. It uses machine learning technique to detect objects around you.

Why.title: Clean Design
Why.text: We uses clean and simple design to make your experience smooth and easy.

Why.title: Easy to Use
Why.text: It is very easy to use, and understand. Just move your device to detect objects.

Why.title: Fast Loading
Why.text: It can be loaded in less than 2 second. It is very fast. and have size less than 20 MB.

Why.title: Hassle Free
Why.text: It doesn't store any user data, so, you can use it without any problem.

About.title: Comes With Speech Synthesis.
About.desp: AI Netra identifies the objects which are pointed by the camera and on tapping the object a voice is generated identifying the object, and it tell the object name immediately.

Features.title: Awesome Key Features.
Features.desc: This app has these key features which makes it different from other apps.

FeaturesBox.title: High Accuracy
FeaturesBox.body: It can detect objects around you with high accuracy, even if the object is moving.

FeaturesBox.title: Multiple Objects, at a time
FeaturesBox.body: It can detect Multiple objects, and will show you the objects with different colors of bounding boxes.

FeaturesBox.title: Detection In Real Time
FeaturesBox.body: This app uses MobileNet which has an inference time of 85% thus provides realtime detection and high frame rates.

FeaturesBox.title: Voice Output
FeaturesBox.body: It will speak the object name immediately when you tap on the object.

FeaturesBox.title: No Internet Required
FeaturesBox.body: It doesn't require any internet connection to work. You can use it without any internet connection.

Testimonial.title: Team Members.
Testimonial.desc: This app has been build as a final year project of our college "Derozio Memorial College". We are a team of three students who are working on this app, to make it better and more user friendly.

Pricing.title: Our project contents.
Pricing.desc: Our project contents are as follows.

Pricingbox.text: To know more about this project, you can check the google slide from here.
To know the methodology and techniques used in this project, you can check the project report.
To know the code used in this project, you can visit the GitHub repository.

Download.title: Scan the QR code or click on the button below to download the app

Footer.address: AI Netra app has been created for object detection in real-time. It may be helpful in the field of robotics, security, automated cars, and surveillance cameras. It can also be useful for blind people to find objects around them, also objects detected in the vicinity will be presented in audio format to the user.
